title: Old Judge book "Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Co."
author: ramram

posts.post_title: Old Judge book "Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Co."
posts.post_content:
It looks like I have a source for a few of Jay, Joe and Richards's book "The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Company".  I just got mine recently and, if you haven't seen it, all I can say is "WOW"!  It really is the Old Judge bible.

I'll take some preorders if that's ok here.  It will be a limited supply so bare with me.  The price is $79 per book + $5 shipping (continental US only).  The book is normally $125.  You would not need to pay me until I have the books in hand.  The books are new.

Rob M.
Hey Rob, can I send you my $125.00 book and you send me a new book plus $41.00?;)

I sure can, but shipping to your neighborhood will be an extra $75. ;-)

Rob
Rob, Put me down for a copy

Rob I would like one also..

thanks Travis
I would be interested in buying a copy as well.

I only have 3 OJ's and never plan on collecting them, but from all that I have heard the book sounds awesome, so count me in for one.

Brian

Thanks for your order guys.

I sent everyone a PM but wanted to post info here just in case you didn't receive it.

I should receive the books early next week.  Once they are in hand i will let you know.  At that time you can send payment of $84 ($79 + $5 shipping).  My preference if for a check or money order but Paypal is ok.  When you get a chance, go ahead and send me your shipping address.

Thanks,
Rob M.

P.S.  I ordered a few extras so anybody else that wants one, please let me know.

I'll take it.  Thanks.

Kenny Cole
If you still have one - just PM when you can - thanks a lot

I'll take one, as well (I also sent an email).

thanks, dave v.
